basics.summary: Innovative IT Engineer and Fullstack Developer experienced in building secure APIs, cloud-based document management systems, and intuitive user interfaces. Skilled in backend and frontend technologies such as NestJS, Next.js, Prisma, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL. Adept in managing Windows Server infrastructure, providing technical support, and automating business processes. Currently pursuing a Master’s in Engineering with a focus on Data Science to enhance analytical and problem-solving skills. Passionate about building real-world solutions that improve business efficiency and user experience.

work.name: Niuko Consultores
work.summary: I develop and implement technological solutions to improve business operations and efficiency. I have designed and manage a dashboard for activity tracking and a system for internal evaluations, which have significantly streamlined workflows and enhanced organizational oversight. I also lead the design, maintenance, and updates of the company’s website, corporate blog, and a chatbot that facilitates better customer interactions. In addition to these tasks, I have automated key processes, such as the delivery of client news and updates via email, reducing manual work and increasing operational speed. My responsibilities extend to providing comprehensive technical support, including infrastructure management, server maintenance, and network administration, ensuring the seamless operation of technological systems. Furthermore, I actively participate in the operation of one of the company’s branches, contributing to both its day-to-day efficiency and long-term objectives. To enhance my expertise, I am currently pursuing a Master’s in Engineering with a focus on Data Science, enabling me to integrate advanced analytical and problem-solving skills into my work. This combination of technical proficiency, process automation, and continuous learning underscores my commitment to driving innovation and supporting organizational growth.
